channel.title: 自动化工具 on 源泉的小站
channel.description: Recent content in 自动化工具 on 源泉的小站

item.title: Terminal
item.description: zsh framework: ohmyzsh Plugin: docker docker-compose z zsh-completions zsh-syntax-highlighting Theme: powerlevel10k How do I add username and/or hostname to prompt? # 删除用户及目录 sudo userdel -r lighthouse # 添加新用户 sudo useradd -d /home/lucas -m lucas # zsh # oh my zsh # p10k # Run Docker commands without sudo sudo gpasswd -a $USER docker # IMPORTANT: Log out and log back in so that your group membership is re-evaluated.
